title: Daley Blind to sign for German giants Bayern Munich
body_text:
Daley Blind is close to finalising a surprise move to Bayern Munich after his recent departure from Ajax.

Blind joined United in the summer of 2014 as part of a raft of signings by then manager, Louis van Gaal.
The versatile Blind played 141 times for the club, scoring six goals during his four season stay at Old Trafford.
His classy attitude on and off the pitch has left fond memories for United fans, one of only a few signings who can say that over the last decade.
Blind formed a solid partnership with Chris Smalling at the heart of Van Gaal‚Äôs defence, a partnership which led united to FA Cup glory in 2016 after beating Crystal Palace in the final at Wembley.
